languages.text: "Может быть. Он был сухарем, иногда мы по нескольку дней и слова друг другу не говорили. Разговорчивее всего он становился, когда по ночам сидел за делами. Просто и скупо рассказывал мне, кто и почему продался, какую мерзость творят еретики на нижних уровнях ульев, ради каких низменных потребностей чернь вешает бригадиров... Мне хватило слышать и слушать, наблюдать и размышлять".

"It's possible. He didn't speak much. Sometimes we went days without saying a word to each other. The only time he was talkative was when he was going through his cases at night. He would inform me in terse and simple words who had sold out and why, what depravities the heretics from the lower hive levels had committed, what base motives the workers had had for hanging their foreman... All I did was listen, watch, and think. That was enough."
languages.original_text: "Может быть. Он был сухарем, иногда мы по нескольку дней и слова друг другу не говорили. Разговорчивее всего он становился, когда по ночам сидел за делами. Просто и скупо рассказывал мне, кто и почему продался, какую мерзость творят еретики на нижних уровнях ульев, ради каких низменных потребностей чернь вешает бригадиров... Мне хватило слышать и слушать, наблюдать и размышлять".

He would inform me in terse and simple words who had sold out and why, what depravities the heretics from the lower hive levels had committed, what base motives the workers had had for hanging their foreman... All I did was listen, watch, and think. That was enough."

All I did was listen, watch, and think. That was enough."

He would inform me in terse and simple words who had sold out and why, what depravities the underhive heretics had committed, what base motives the workers had had for hanging their foreman... All I did was listen, watch, and think. That was enough."

"It's possible. He didn't speak much. Sometimes we went days without saying a word to each other. The only time he was talkative was when he was going through his cases at night. All I did was listen, watch, and think. That was enough."

All I did was listen, watch, and think. That was enough."

All I did was listen, watch, and think. That was enough."

languages.text: 「そうかもしれませんね。父は多くを語らない人でした。何日も言葉を交わさずに過ごすこともあったくらいです。彼が饒舌になる唯一の時間は、夜に事件を整理しているときでした。誰がなぜ裏切ったのか。下レベルの異端者たちがどんな邪悪な行為を犯したのか。労働者たちがなぜ監督官を吊るしたのか…そうしたことを、父は簡潔でそっけない言葉で私に伝えました。私はただ、聞いて、見て、考えるだけでした。それだけでよかったんです」
languages.original_text: "It's possible. He didn't speak much. Sometimes we went days without saying a word to each other. The only time he was talkative was when he was going through his cases at night. He would inform me in terse and simple words who had sold out and why, what depravities the heretics from the lower hive levels had committed, what base motives the workers had had for hanging their foreman... All I did was listen, watch, and think. That was enough."

traits.locale_text: 「そうかもしれませんね。父は多くを語らない人でした。何日も言葉を交わさずに過ごすこともあったくらいです。彼が饒舌になる唯一の時間は、夜に事件を整理しているときでした。誰がなぜ裏切ったのか。アンダーハイヴの異端者たちがどんな邪悪な行為を犯したのか。労働者たちがなぜ監督官を吊るしたのか…そうしたことを、父は簡潔でそっけない言葉で私に伝えました。私はただ、聞いて、見て、考えるだけでした。それだけでよかったんです」

languages.text: "Das ist möglich. Er hat nicht viel gesagt. Manchmal haben wir tagelang nicht miteinander gesprochen. Gesprächig war er eigentlich nur, wenn er nachts seine Fälle durchging. Er informierte mich in knappen und einfachen Worte, wer wen warum verraten hatte, welche Abartigkeiten die Ketzer aus den unteren Ebenen der Makropole verbrochen hatten und welche Motive die Arbeiter hatten, die ihren Vorarbeiter aufgehängt hatten ... Ich habe nur zugehört, zugesehen und nachgedacht. Das war genug."
languages.original_text: "It's possible. He didn't speak much. Sometimes we went days without saying a word to each other. The only time he was talkative was when he was going through his cases at night. He would inform me in terse and simple words who had sold out and why, what depravities the heretics from the lower hive levels had committed, what base motives the workers had had for hanging their foreman... All I did was listen, watch, and think. That was enough."

traits.locale_text: "Das ist möglich. Er hat nicht viel gesagt. Manchmal haben wir tagelang nicht miteinander gesprochen. Gesprächig war er eigentlich nur, wenn er nachts seine Fälle durchging. Ich habe nur zugehört, zugesehen und nachgedacht. Das war genug."

languages.text: « Ce n'est pas impossible. Il n'était pas bavard. Parfois, nous passions des journées entières sans nous adresser la moindre parole. Il ne s'ouvrait à moi que lorsqu'il travaillait sur ses dossiers, tard dans la nuit. Il m'annonçait de manière laconique qui avait trahi qui, et pourquoi, me relatait les dernières dépravations commises par les hérétiques des niveaux inférieurs de la ruche et m'expliquait pourquoi les ouvriers avaient décidé de pendre leur contremaître... Tandis que moi, je me contentais de l'écouter, de l'observer et d'analyser les dossiers. C'était suffisant. »
languages.original_text: "It's possible. He didn't speak much. Sometimes we went days without saying a word to each other. The only time he was talkative was when he was going through his cases at night. He would inform me in terse and simple words who had sold out and why, what depravities the heretics from the lower hive levels had committed, what base motives the workers had had for hanging their foreman... All I did was listen, watch, and think. That was enough."

traits.locale_text: « Ce n'est pas impossible. Il n'était pas bavard. Parfois, nous passions des journées entières sans nous adresser la moindre parole. Il ne s'ouvrait à moi que lorsqu'il travaillait sur ses dossiers, tard dans la nuit. Il m'annonçait de manière laconique qui avait trahi qui, et pourquoi, me relatait les dernières dépravations commises par les hérétiques des niveaux inférieurs de la ruche et m'expliquait pourquoi les ouvriers avaient décidé de pendre leur contremaître... Tandis que moi, je me contentais de l'écouter, de l'observer et d'analyser les dossiers. C'était suffisant. »

languages.text: «Es posible. No hablaba mucho. A veces nos pasábamos días sin mediar palabra. El único momento en que se mostraba locuaz era cuando repasaba sus casos por la noche. Me informaba con palabras escuetas y sencillas de quién se había vendido y por qué, de las depravaciones cometidas por los herejes de los niveles inferiores de la colmena, de los viles motivos que tenían los obreros para ahorcar a su capataz... Yo me limitaba a escuchar, observar y pensar. Con eso bastó».
languages.original_text: "It's possible. He didn't speak much. Sometimes we went days without saying a word to each other. The only time he was talkative was when he was going through his cases at night. He would inform me in terse and simple words who had sold out and why, what depravities the heretics from the lower hive levels had committed, what base motives the workers had had for hanging their foreman... All I did was listen, watch, and think. That was enough."

traits.locale_text: «Es posible. No hablaba mucho. A veces nos pasábamos días sin mediar palabra. El único momento en que se mostraba locuaz era cuando repasaba sus casos por la noche. Me informaba con palabras escuetas y sencillas de quién se había vendido y por qué, de las depravaciones cometidas por los herejes de los niveles inferiores de la colmena, de los viles motivos que tenían los obreros para ahorcar a su capataz... Yo me limitaba a escuchar, observar y pensar. Con eso bastó».

languages.text: “或许有可能。他是个沉默寡言的人，有时候，我们好几天一句话都说不上。只有当他晚上清点案子的时候，他才会开口。这种时候，他会以简明扼要的方式告诉我是谁出卖了谁，为什么要这么做，那些巢都底层的异端分子做了什么勾当，那些工人出于何种卑鄙的动机绞死了他们的工头……而我要做的，就是倾听、观察、思考，这就够了。”
languages.original_text: "It's possible. He didn't speak much. Sometimes we went days without saying a word to each other. The only time he was talkative was when he was going through his cases at night. He would inform me in terse and simple words who had sold out and why, what depravities the heretics from the lower hive levels had committed, what base motives the workers had had for hanging their foreman... All I did was listen, watch, and think. That was enough."

traits.locale_text: “或许有可能。他是个沉默寡言的人，有时候，我们好几天一句话都说不上。只有当他晚上清点案子的时候，他才会开口。这种时候，他会以简明扼要的方式告诉我是谁出卖了谁，为什么要这么做，那些巢都底层的异端分子做了什么勾当，那些工人出于何种卑鄙的动机绞死了他们的工头……而我要做的，就是倾听、观察、思考，这就够了。”

languages.text: "Mümkün. Pek konuşan biri değildi. Bazen günlerce tek kelime bile etmezdik. Konuşkan olduğu tek vakit, geceleri davaları gözden geçirdiği zamandı. Bana satıcının kim olduğunu ve neden sattığını, düşük kovan seviyelerinden kâfirlerin ne tür ahlaksızlıklara bulaştıklarını, işçilerin ustabaşlarını asmak için ne tür aşağılık güdülere sahip olduğunu basit ve kısa kelimelerle anlatırdı... Ben de dinlemek, izlemek ve düşünmekten başka bir şey yapmazdım. Bu da yeterliydi."
languages.original_text: "It's possible. He didn't speak much. Sometimes we went days without saying a word to each other. The only time he was talkative was when he was going through his cases at night. He would inform me in terse and simple words who had sold out and why, what depravities the heretics from the lower hive levels had committed, what base motives the workers had had for hanging their foreman... All I did was listen, watch, and think. That was enough."
